Projects
PORTFOLIO

This is a frontend project made using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. The site is hosted using github and you are looking at it. Bootstrap is used and SVG is also used while making this. A part of this project is learnt from a friend from a similar project of his. This project consists of a few pages displaying information about me, my skills and my projects till now. The pages are hyperlinked with each other for easy navigation.

DYNAMIC FILTER

This is an android app and is available on playstore. This app allows us to apply multiple filters on an image with different intensities stacked on top of each other. Both Java and XML is used in making this. Extra libraries include libraries for gesture and slider controls. This app supports all androids above API 16. This includes even old versions such as JellyBean. This app is also added on playstore.


OPEN WORLD PROTOTYPE

This is a game built using Unreal Engine. Several other softwares were also used for making this. This includes but is not limited to Blender, Sony Vegas Pro, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Mixamo etc. This is a simple modern day open world game prototype. The basic functionalities are all there which includes changing time of day, walking, running, driving, basic shooting and AI mechanics. Any modern day based game can be built upon this basic structure and hence it is called a prototype.
REALTIME GUI

This is a simple software built using the .NET framework in Visual Studio. This was made for a live telemetry system built by a small team of about five people to be put inside an electric car. Data was collected using different sensors and fed into a board. Data was then uploaded from this board using a LTE module connected to it. This data was then downloaded and displayed using appropriate graphs, gauges etc. An important library used in all this was LiveChart for WPF.
MAZE GAME

This is a simple multiplayer game made using SDL libraries from scratch in C++. A maze is randomly generated and players are supposed to move towards each other in a maze in a turn based system. The player to reach the opponent's position wins. SDL_net was used to make socket connections. SDL_mixer was used for music. SDL2 was used for IO. A better version of Maze generating algorithm was developed later but was not implemented into the game.
EMPLOYEE DATABASE

This is a simple java GUI made using the "swing" and "awt" libraries. It takes in a csv file consisting of details of different people. This GUI was made to act as an Employee Database. All details from the csv file is read and displayed on the screen. All names comes in a scroll window. Clicking on any name displays all the data about that employee. Image display feature was also added for the employee ID.
